channel.title: AboutMe on Bryan Chasko's Portfolio

item.title: ☁️ How I Became an AWS Hero 🦸‍♂️
item.description: ☁️ Day 1 on Amazon Web Services (AWS) Cloud w/Bryan Chasko A Journey of Innovation, Leadership, and AWS Expertise “One of the leading innovators in the world” Background Intro to ethical hacking and electronics via time in US Army Special Operations Nature Lover from New Mexico’s Sacramento Mountains New York Institute of Photography Alumni Top 5000 in EA’s Madden NFL three times as the New England Patriots Cat Compadre named Buddy 🐱 80’s Baby Born with acess to an MS-DOS Computer near Yuma Proving Grounds 💾 AWS Hero since 2008 known for Community and Spatial Computing “Bryan Chasko’s journey with Amazon’s ecosystem has been nothing short of transformative, reflecting his deep understanding of AWS and its potential.

item.title: Bryan Chasko's Skills and Experience 🦊
item.description: Skills and Experience 🦊 Quick Links Skills: Cloud Platforms & Services ☁️ • Infrastructure & Networking 🔧 • Data Management 📊 • Observability & Monitoring 📈 • Security & Compliance 🔒 • Design & Prototyping 🎨 • Project Management & Leadership 👥 • Data Visualization 📊 • CRM Systems 💼 • Industry Experience 🏢 • Design & Engineering 🏗️ • Machine Learning & AI 🤖 • Internet of Things (IoT) 🌐 • Big Data 📉 • Additional Skills 🔧

item.title: My Cat Buddy 🐈
item.description: Adopt a pet from Guadalupe County Animal Control My Cat Buddy 🐱 Buddy is a tabby cat from Mesilla Park, New Mexico. He likes to play catch with springs and eat fish. See #caturday on my insta, X, and threads. We both appreciate your donations to Guadalupe County Animal Control Phone: 505-472-3711 Santa Rosa Animal Shelter, 117 S. 5th Street, Santa Rosa, New Mexico 88435 Get directions to adopt your new pet from beautiful Santa Rosa NM on Route 66

item.title: Bryan Chasko's Basics 🦊
item.description: About Bryan 🦊 #AWSHero since 2018 known for 🌟 Community & Spatial Computing 🌍AWS Hero Bio Personal Background US Army Special Operations Veteran 🎖️ New York Institute of Photography Alumni 📸. insta Nature Lover 🌲 From New Mexico’s Sacramento Mountains 🏞️. trails Top 5000 🏆 In EA’s Madden NFL 3 times as the New England Patriots 🏈 Eighties Baby 🦊 Born comfortable with a terminal thanks to an MS-DOS Computer 💻.

item.title: New England Patriots Fandom 🏈
item.description: New England Patriots Fandom 🏈 I’ve been lucky enough to see professional american football in 15 cities and visited all but 1 NFL stadium.
